qiyan.那小公子的脚劲可真大: That little young master can really kick…
qiyan.岂颜阿古纳已死，这世上只有齐颜: Qiyan Aguna is already dead, there is only Qi Yan in this world.
qiyan.臣齐颜奉旨迎娶蓁蓁殿下: This subject, Qi Yan, welcomes the Zhenzhen Highness’ hand in marriage as decreed!
qiyan.臣为殿下之命是从: This subject, only follows the will of Your Highness.
qiyan.臣担心殿下回来寻不到臣: This subject was worried that, when Your Highness comes back, you would find no one…
qiyan.殿下的愿望便是臣的愿望: The wishes of Her Highness are the wishes of this subject.
qiyan.就像一位粉雕玉琢的小公子: In this outfit, Your Highness looks just like a young master carved from jade.
qiyan.星辰近在咫尺何谈可惜: The stars are only inches away, what’s so bad about that?
qiyan.臣这辈子绝不可能再娶旁人: This subject will absolutely not marry anyone else in this lifetime, no matter what happens. Never.
qiyan.殿下可以抱一下臣吗: Your Highness, can you hug this subject?
qiyan.殿下是还没摸够吗: Your Highness, have you not touched enough?
qiyan.殿下违背誓言是想和臣一起下地狱吗: You have gone back on your word, Your Highness. Does that mean you wish to go to hell with this subject?
qiyan.殿下喜欢上臣了？: Did Your Highness fall for this subject?
qiyan.殿下心细如发温柔似水: Your Highness is attentive to details, and as gentle as water. This subject cannot be grateful enough.
qiyan.能杀她的人只有我: Nangong Jingnu is the only person I can rely on. Do not touch her! The only one who can kill her... is me!
qiyan.你却反过来惦记我: I’ve used you for my plans again and again, yet you’re concerned for me instead…
qiyan.你若不是南宫家的女儿那该有多好: If you weren’t a daughter of the Nangong family, how great would that be…
qiyan.你我的结局一早便注定了: Your Highness, oh, Your Highness… If you weren’t a daughter of the Nangong family, how great would that be? Hah… But if you weren’t a daughter of the Nangong family, how would I have ever met you? When it comes down to it, our fate has been doomed from the start.
qiyan.汝之不幸皆因我一手缔造: Your Highness, oh, Your Highness… Do you know that all of your misfortune were designed by my hand?
qiyan.在我亲手杀死你之前: Your Highness, before I kill you with my own hands, I will treat you with sincerity too.

jingnu.她的眼睛好像和我们不一样，是琥珀色的: His eyes seem to be different from ours. It’s, um, amber-colored.
jingnu.我还是第一次见到那样特别的眼睛呢: The scholar that bumped into er-jie today, really had amber eyes, those eyes are so unique, I’ve never seen eyes like that!
jingnu.这就是父亲常说的民间疾苦吗: Is… that what father often calls, the hardships of the common people?
jingnu.你这人怎的如此无礼: How can you be so rude? You knocked down my, my er-ge, why didn’t you stop and help?
jingnu.正是那日撞倒二姐的书生: I’m sure of it. Those amber eyes, this is the scholar that bumped into er-jie that day.
jingnu.诲人不倦的齐夫子: I got it! Nagging Pedant Qi!
jingnu.我们去放河灯吧: Alright! Let’s got set off river lanterns. Hey, look, there are already so many lanterns over there!
jingnu.四愿齐颜长命百岁: For the fourth, I wish for Qi Yan to live to a ripe old age. And for a famous doctor to visit and cure his eyes…
jingnu.看来她真的就是牧羊居士了: Qi Yan’s writing… Looks like he really is the Hermit Shepherd. There’s no way I can mistake the style of that writing.
jingnu.好舍不得你: Yuanjun, I can’t bear the thought of leaving you.
jingnu.哪里疼: What’s wrong? Where does it hurt?
jingnu.你都伤哪儿了: Say something! where are you hurt? Don’t lie to me!
jingnu.你我是否也能琴瑟和鸣: Qi Yan, if I wasn’t young and playful, if I was a woman of talents like er-jie, will we be able to perform a musical duet as well?
jingnu.你怎么没穿衣服: Why, why are you… not wearing clothes?
jingnu.齐颜你千万不要有事: Qi Yan, you better be alright…
jingnu.我是第一个叫你表字的人吗: I’m the first person to call you by your courtesy name, how wonderful.
jingnu.我想离你再近一些: Qi Yan… I want, to be closer to you.
jingnu.这颗珠子的光芒温润不伤眼睛: The soft glow of this pearl is gentle on the eyes. Carry it with you during the night.
